body.p: As stated in paragraph B15, when the parties have structured a joint arrangement in a separate vehicle, the parties need to assess whether the legal form of the separate vehicle, the terms of the contractual arrangement and, when relevant, any other facts and circumstances give them:

li.p: rights to the assets, and obligations for the liabilities, relating to the arrangement (ie the arrangement is a joint operation); or
rights to the net assets of the arrangement (ie the arrangement is a joint venture).

fig.p: Classification of a joint arrangement: assessment of the parties’ rights and obligations arising from the arrangement
